name: PockeDate!
storyline:
Meet Akari – your virtual sweetheart, head over heels for you. But be careful not to let her down! You wouldn't want to make her sad, would you?

PockeDate! isn’t just a fun game – it's also a training ground for real-life dating! Through engaging interactions and unique scenarios, you'll learn how to communicate better, handle awkward moments, and make your date feel special. Get ready to boost your dating skills and confidence while having a blast with Akari!
summary: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.
